titleStmt.title: A testimony and wholesome advice concerning marriage.
titleStmt.author: Seaton, Alexander.
Edmundson, William, 1627-1712.
Bingley, William, 1651-1715. Epistle of love and tender advice, to friends and brethren in America, or elsewhere.
Whitehead, Anne, 1624-1686. Epistle for true love, unity, and order in the Church of Christ.
Elson, Mary, 1623 or 4-1707. Epistle for true love, unity, and order in the Church of Christ

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Given forth at the National Men and Womens Meetings, assembled together in Dublin the 10th day of the third month, 1680. Signed in behalf of the said meetings, by Alexander Set[...].

Filmed with t.p.'s for: An epistle of love and tender advice, to friends and brethren in America, or elsewhere / by William Bingley. [London] : Printed by Andrew Sowle ..., 1649; and An epistle for true love, unity and order in the Church of Christ / by ... Anne Whitehead, Mary Elson. London : Printed and sold by Andrew Sowle ... [1677?].
Imperfect: t.p. lacking; p. 8 torn with partial loss of signature.
Reproduction of original in the Haverford College Library.
